title: [caffe2] Double precision for operators?
body_html:
A lot of the operators are not defined for double precision. I am planning on experimenting with double precision calculations and will add them as necessary. Would there be interest in me submitting a PR request with them? Is there a reason they are not currently enabled? The only drawback is larger library file size and slower compilation time but I suppose not by much.

Thank you,
Svet

body:
A lot of the operators are not defined for double precision. I am planning on experimenting with double precision calculations and will add them as necessary. Would there be interest in me submitting a PR request with them? Is there a reason they are not currently enabled? The only drawback is larger library file size and slower compilation time but I suppose not by much.

Thank you,
